ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h6
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > footer > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > footer > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h6:nth-child(1)
